mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tvscore ( score, name, ts, depth, rfactor, fair, distribution, randomizer, adaptive, reason ) VALUES ( #{score}, #{name}, #{ts}, #{depth}, #{rfactor}, #{fair}, #{distribution}, #{randomizer}, #{adaptive}, #{reason});
mapper.select: SELECT score, name, ts, depth, rfactor, fair, distribution, randomizer, adaptive, reason FROM tvscore WHERE depth = #{depth} AND rfactor = #{rfactor} AND fair = #{fair} AND distribution = #{distribution} AND randomizer = #{randomizer} AND adaptive = #{adaptive} ORDER BY score DESC, ts ASC LIMIT 1;
